website_summaries.verdict: Small towel warmer designed for one or two people, but it has a high price tag.
pros: Polished chrome finish and stainless steel design should give you a long lifespan while resisting rust
Mounts to the wall to free up floor space
Doesn't take up much wall space with dimensions of 16.5" x 23.5"
Can be plugged into an outlet for convenience
cons: Expensive for such a small coverage area
Does not offer a freestanding option

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t Do The Job
customer_reviews.text: Looks great but it didn’t heat the towels effectively. I tried everything including wrapping the towel around the bars for a long time but it just wouldn’t do the job so I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Ohio Guy

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, warms less great but adequate
customer_reviews.text: We liked the way this looked in the bathroom, and its easy on-off operation. The electrician noted it would take a while to actually heat up (much longer than a shower) so he recommended leaving it on. It doesn't use much electricity and it takes so long to get warm, that is what we have to do. But it helps dry the bathroom, so it is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: CJL

customer_reviews.title: Would rate 4/5!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is overall a good towel warmer. It works well and is very efficient in warming up my towels quickly. The product comes with plastic plug anchors with screws, which only works with solid walls, not drywalls. These plug anchors did not work well so I had to buy separate anchors that would work for walls. But other then that, I like this product and would recommend it to anyone. This product is good for one big towel or multiple small towels just because of its size.
customer_reviews.author: Roman Saluga

customer_reviews.title: . Will updated after bathroom remodel complete.
customer_reviews.text: Installed by a professional contractor. Have not yet used it but pleased so far with, look, design and wall mount function.

customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly. This was a wonderful addition to our bathroom remodel. I would recommend. Perfect for a master bathroom.

customer_reviews.title: Great utility to warm up and dry bathroom towels while keeping them organized!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Looks great in our bathroom and serves its purpose. It would have been great if it came with a timer but I was able to get one lying in the house so it could start and stop heating to minimize energy costs.
